statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ 5 \\ -5 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 23 \\ 9 \\ -27 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
